channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- C SDK
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- C SDK

item.title: CVE-2018-8479|2024-08-05T06:54:36.525Z -- microsoft -- c%20sdk
item.description: A spoofing vulnerability exists for the Azure IoT Device Provisioning for the C SDK library using the HTTP protocol on Windows platform, aka "Azure IoT SDK Spoofing Vulnerability." This affects C SDK.
